object.name: Better and easier syntax for arrays

object:
Operators to return the larger or smaller of two values.

a=b[c , d]   The same as 'a=b[c][d]' but shorter and easier to understand and read.
android ios mac pc
a={{1,2,3},{4,5,6},{7,8,9}} b=a[2,2] -- b will be 5, easier to read than b=[a][b] a[2,2]=7 -- same as a[2][2]=7
